thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: FC Porto H1 Net Loss Narrows To 23.9 Mln Euros YoY

author: Reuters Editorial
title: FC Porto H1 Net Loss Narrows To 23.9 Mln Euros YoY
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - FUTEBOL CLUBE DO PORTO FUTEBOL SAD :
* SAID ON WEDNESDAY H1 2017/2018 NET LOSS 23.9 MILLION EUROS VERSUS LOSS 29.6 MILLION EUROS YEAR AGO
* H1 NEGATIVE OPERATING RESULT 16.2 MILLION EUROS VERSUS NEGATIVE 21.8 MILLION YEAR AGO
* H1 OPERATING REVENUE EXCLUDING PLAYER RELATED DEALS 61.9 MILLION EUROS VERSUS 58.8 MILLION EUROS YEAR AGO
* H1 REVENUE FROM PLAYER RELATED DEALS 5.3 MILLION EUROS VERSUS 1.1 MILLION EUROS YEAR AGO
Source text: bit.ly/2GUOTm2
 (Gdynia Newsroom)
